alert.note: Alert for Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 10:34AM CDT until May 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Ill. City LD16. * WHEN...Until Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Water affects the Buffalo Shores Access Area. Lock and Dam 16 is closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hold around 17.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
